minions.name: Awesome Guy
minions.description: Ongoing: Your minions here cannot be destroyed by other players

minions.name: The Burst
minions.description: Ongoing: After a minion is played on a base, you may move this minion to there

minions.name: Captain Amazing
minions.description: Talent: Give each of your minions here +1 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Mind Lady
minions.description: Talent: Choose another player's minion. That minion's abilities are cancelled until the start of your next turn

minions.name: Mild Mannered Citizen
minions.description: Ongoing: At the start of your turn you may destroy this minion to search your deck for a minion of power 5 or more, play it here as an extra minion, and shuffle your deck

actions.name: Golden Age
actions.description: Place up to three minions from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck

actions.name: Justice Friends
actions.description: Each of your minions of power 5 or more gains +2 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Not Really Dead
actions.description: Place up to two minions of power 2 or less from your discard pile into your hand

actions.name: Expanded Power
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power and can't be destroyed by other players

actions.name: My Only Weakness
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion's abilities are cancelled

actions.name: Radioactive Exposure
actions.description: Destroy one of your minions to search your deck for a minion with more power, play it here as an extra minion, and shuffle your deck

actions.name: Secret Base
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here of power 3 or less cannot be destroyed by other players

actions.name: Sidekick
actions.description: Choose a base where you have a minion of power 5 or more. Play a minion there of power 2 or less as an extra minion
